name: Choose the bridge
description:
3D puzzle game demo. Made for RosarioGameDevs GameLab 2022. We created a Drag&Drop puzzle game, with original 3D art, music and SFX. Made in unity.

Unity developer: Renzo Scotta    ---->    https://rscotta.itch.io/
3D art: Pol                                                ---->    https://dersteppenwolf.itch.io/
Music & SFX: Manu Sanchez         ---->    https://mache30.itch.io/
